login_error_redirected: You have been redirected back to the portal. Login with your discord account to continue.
login_error_expired: Your login has expired. Login with your discord account to continue.
login_error_security: You have been logged out for security reasons. Login with your discord account to continue.
login_account_suspended: Your account is currently suspended from using our services. Want to appeal? Contact us.
login_account_deleted: Your account is currently not allowed from using our services. Contact us if you wish to reinstate your account.
login_description_one: Since 2021, we've been securing Discord communities with the best Threat Sampler service on the market.
login_description_two: Take a look around our site to learn why you need Sensory.
login_welcome_login: Continue by logging in with your Discord account.
login_welcome_policy: By authorizing your discord account you agree to our Terms Of Service & Privacy Policy.
login_ratelimit_warning: Services are currently going under heavy load. You will be able to login in a few moments.
